title: 5v5 scrim partners
body:
Hey Guys,

I've recently put together a team. haven't played the 5 provisional games yet but we are all sitting around silver and gold.
Just looking for someone else out there with a team that we can verse every now and then as scrim partners to get out game up to scratch?
Pls add me and we can chat in game for a suitable date and time to play.

span
